Text:
Another crap remastering by universal. Clipped to buggery. Oh well the money machine rolls on.

Thanks for this n-101.

I'm sure I will have my answer before I read it, but is the REMASTERING REALLY THAT BAD? I generally prefer remasters, but I went to an audio recording school and tend to be picky.t I really enjoy there more popular hits, which is why I thought it would be great to hear them done remastered in Flac too!

One has to wonder how far Freddy could of gone with his career if he didn't die such an untimely death. I think when Freddy died is when aids started to scare the world, so wild to think of the politics of those days and then hear the MUSIC just jam right on! Its sad how many people that still wont give this classic band the time of day, some things never change.
